content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
- PipeGroup connected to the offshore pump, starting at Position (-47.5, -122.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) containing iron plates
- Wooden Chest at Position (6.5, -59.5) containing iron ore and iron plates

### Power Network
Consists of:
- Multiple Small Electric Poles, including positions such as (-39.5, -106.5) and (-36.5, -107.5)
- ElectricityGroup with id 1131246, currently not supplying power

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities on Occupied Tiles
- Ensure that the target tile for placing an entity is free from other objects to avoid placement failures.

### Errors in Connecting to Power Network
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities to the power network.

### Inserter Not Receiving Power
- Ensure that the inserter is correctly connected to a powered electric pole to avoid power issues.

### Assertion Errors Related to Power
- Double-check connections and ensure all necessary components are in place and powered to prevent assertion errors related to power supply.
